label: Spaghetti Carbonara
method: Step 1: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Step 2: Fry pancetta until crispy.
Step 3: Mix eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
Step 4: Drain spaghetti and combine with pancetta.
Step 5: Stir in egg mixture quickly.
Step 6: Add pasta water if needed for creaminess.
Step 7: Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

label: Chicken Tacos
method: Step 1: Cook the chicken.
Step 2: Prepare the tortillas.
Step 3: Slice the tomatoes and lettuce.
Step 4: Assemble the tacos with chicken, tomatoes, lettuce, and cheese.
Step 5: Serve and enjoy!
Step 6: Add your favorite hot sauce for extra flavor.
Step 7: Optionally, garnish with cilantro and lime wedges.
Step 8: Pair with a side of guacamole and chips for a complete meal.

label: Vegan Stir-Fry
method: Step 1: Cube the tofu and prepare the vegetables.
Step 2: Heat a pan and stir-fry the tofu and vegetables with soy sauce.
Step 3: Serve the vegan stir-fry.
Step 4: Optionally, sprinkle sesame seeds on top for added texture.
Step 5: Garnish with green onions for extra flavor.
Step 6: Pair with steamed rice or noodles for a complete meal.
Step 7: Enjoy your homemade vegan stir-fry!

label: Apple
method: Step 1: Wash and slice the apple.
Step 2: Enjoy the apple slices as a healthy snack.
Step 3: Optionally, dip the apple slices in peanut butter for a tasty twist.
Step 4: Sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon for added flavor.

label: Banana
method: Step 1: Peel the banana.
Step 2: Slice and enjoy the banana as a quick snack.
Step 3: Optionally, top with a drizzle of honey for sweetness.
Step 4: Add a sprinkle of granola for extra crunch.

label: Strawberry
method: Step 1: Wash and hull the strawberries.
Step 2: Enjoy the strawberries as a refreshing snack or dessert.
Step 3: Optionally, dip in melted chocolate for a decadent treat.
Step 4: Pair with whipped cream for a delightful dessert.
